alert.note: Alert for Clark; Dallas; Ouachita (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 1:53AM CDT until June 26 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Clark County in southwestern Arkansas... Southwestern Dallas County in southwestern Arkansas... Northern Ouachita County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 245 AM CDT. * At 153 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Gurdon, or 15 miles northeast of Prescott, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Camden... Gurdon... Bearden... Chidester... Whelen Springs... Beirne... Poison Springs State Park... White Oak Lake State Park... Amy... Eagle Mills... Harmony Grove... Reader... Vaden... Troy... Warner... Tates Bluff... Bragg City... Millville... Curtis... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
